feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E102H01 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 6, 07:00 - 08:30 UTC

Sep 17, 23:31 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer on rack E102H01.

This may temporarily affect availability.
Start time: 06/11/2025 07:00 UTC
End time: 06/11/2025 08:30 UTC
Service impact: During the operation, servers in rack E102H01 will be temporarily unavailable.
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will migrate servers in rack E102H01 to rack ERI0102C05C.

Thank you for your understanding.
